Read Only Board

Now it is possible to publish read only board URL.

Password Protect Your Board

Go Pro

Now it is possible to go Pro Sketchboard.Me user. Just send email to sketchboardme[ at ]7scales.net to get your pro status. With Pro account you are able to

  • Mark Boards as Pro
  • Protect Pro boards with a password
  • Share Pro boards with readonly url
  • Pro boards are not removed after 30 days

At this phase you can mark five boards as Pro. As always, give feedback! @SketchboardMe.
